title: Aggregate Analysis of ClinicalTrials.gov
description: A relational database containing information about clinical studies that have been registered at ClinicalTrials.gov
creator: Clinical Trials Transformation Intiative (CTTI)

title: Drugs@FDA
description: Information about FDA-approved brand name and generic prescription and over-the-counter human drugs and biological therapeutic products.
creator: U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA)
maintainer: Center for Drug Evaluation and Research (CDER)

title: Purple Book
description: The Purple Book database contains information on all FDA-licensed (approved) biological products regulated by the Center for Drug Evaluation and Research (CDER), including licensed biosimilar and interchangeable products, and their reference products.
creator: U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA)
maintainer: Center for Biologics Evaluation and Research (CBER)

title: Human Drug Labeling
description: Essential scientific information needed for safe and effective use of human prescription drug or biological product.
creator: U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA)

title: ChEMBL
description: ChEMBL is a manually curated database of bioactive molecules with drug-like properties.
creator: European Molecular Biology Laboratory (EMBL)

title: Target-Disease Evidence
description: Open Targets consortium, the Platform builds and scores target-disease associations to assist in drug target identification and prioritisation
creator: Open Targets

title: Drug-Mechanism of Action
description: Open Targets consortium, the Platform builds and scores target-disease associations to assist in drug target identification and prioritisation
creator: Open Targets
